name: Sanitzie Sakura For ScaLAPACK
description:
I couldn't stand reading the ScaLAPACK user guide so I decided to auto-style it using the excellent Sakura.css

I removed (reset) the cruft with sanitize.css

Consider a donation if this saved your eyes.
